MAIN_MESSAGE: Due to high winds in CW8 postcode area of Northwich we have sustained damage to our overhead line network over a widespread area. Our engineers are currently assessing the damage and when it is safe to commence repairs will make every effort to restore supplies as quickly and safely as possible by 2.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.  This message was updated at 12:02PM on 11th March 2021.
